subject: 1 order missing
description_text:
To whom it may concern,

I’m writing about my recent order placed on the 5th, Order #025295. The sim racing pedals arrived on time as scheduled; however, the haptic feedback device that was included in the same order has not been delivered. I waited several days beyond the expected delivery window, but there’s been no update or delivery.

Could you please confirm whether the haptic device has shipped and provide the current status. If there is a delay or backorder, I’d appreciate a revised estimated delivery date. If it has not shipped, please advise on next steps, including options for expedited.

Thank you for your prompt assistance. I look forward to your update.

Kind regards,
Jordon

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Anthony Jordon,    Here is the tracking link for your other package. It is scheduled to arrive on the 12th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047030910190

Hey,
I received it today.

Many Thanks
Jay

________________________________
